short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When triggered, this extension copies the kudos from a review site and cleans them. Then, they can be pasted into a spreadsheet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When triggered, this extension copies the kudos (testimonials / reviews) from a review site and cleans them. Then, they can be pasted into a spreadsheet. 

Go to your review page on one of the following sites and click the extension to copy kudos to your clipboard. Then, go paste them in excel, numbers, google sheets, or wherever!

Linked in 
The Bash 
Gig Salad
TripAdvisor 
Google Reviews 
Facebook  Reviews
Thumbtack
